statements.sql: select * from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'hot-tv' and table_name = 'settings' and table_type = 'BASE TABLE'

data.live-channel.show #3JgzH5sJTZpyV6pNWNXI:
array:5 [ "data" => array:5 [ "timeArray" => array:4 [ 0 => array:2 [ "start" => 23.05 "end" => 23.116666666667 ] 1 => array:2 [ "start" => 23.116666666667 "end" => 23.166666666667 ] 2 => array:2 [ "start" => 0.86666666666667 "end" => 0.9 ] 3 => array:2 [ "start" => 0.91666666666667 "end" => 0.98333333333333 ] ] "infoArray" => array:4 [ 0 => array:3 [ "title" => "Video 3" "description" => "Video Description 3" "src" => "http://127.0.0.1:8000/storage/files/50ad80cd-c937-49fb-a915-2d085631d9b2.mp4" ] 1 => array:3 [ "title" => "Video 1" "description" => """

Welcome to a mesmerizing journey through one of Italy's most picturesque and enchanting destinations, the Amalfi Coast! In this captivating video, we invite you to embark on a visual odyssey that will transport you to a world of stunning natural beauty, rich history, and vibrant culture.

\n

The Amalfi Coast, nestled along the southern edge of the Sorrentine Peninsula in Italy, is a true gem waiting to be discovered. Our adventure begins as we wind along the scenic coastal road, offering breathtaking views of the Tyrrhenian Sea, where the azure waters meet the dramatic cliffs that define this coastal paradise.

\n

Join us as we explore the charming coastal villages that dot the landscape, each with its own unique character and charm. From the pastel-colored buildings of Positano, where narrow streets lead down to pristine beaches, to the historic town of Amalfi itself, with its ancient cathedral and bustling piazzas, you'll be captivated by the authentic Italian atmosphere.

\n

Intriguing history and culture are woven into the very fabric of the Amalfi Coast, and we'll take you on a journey back in time to discover its roots. Explore the medieval architecture of Ravello, where Villa Rufolo offers stunning gardens and a panorama that has inspired countless artists and poets throughout the ages.

\n

The Amalfi Coast is not only a feast for the eyes but also a haven for food enthusiasts. Join us as we savor the flavors of regional cuisine, from freshly caught seafood to delectable lemon-infused dishes. You'll get an inside look at the local culinary traditions that have been passed down through generations.

\n

Adventure seekers won't be disappointed either, as we delve into the many outdoor activities available. Whether it's hiking along ancient trails, taking a boat ride to hidden coves, or simply lounging on sun-soaked beaches, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

\n

But the true magic of the Amalfi Coast lies in its ability to make you feel like you've stepped into a dream. As the sun sets over the horizon, casting a golden glow over the coastline, you'll understand why this destination has enchanted travelers for centuries.

\n

Join us on this unforgettable journey as we capture the essence of the Amalfi Coast, a place where time seems to slow down, and beauty knows no bounds. Don't miss this opportunity to immerse yourself in the allure of Italy's hidden gem. Sit back, relax, and let the Amalfi Coast cast its spell on you.

""" "src" => "http://127.0.0.1:8000/storage/files/6842a336-3bba-440a-9558-229bcea72288.mp4" ] 2 => array:3 [ "title" => "Play this 1" "description" => """

Welcome to an epic adventure along the breathtaking Amalfi Coast! Join us on this mesmerizing journey as we delve into the heart of one of Italy's most picturesque regions, renowned for its stunning landscapes, charming villages, and rich history.

\n

In this captivating video, we will take you on a visual odyssey through the Amalfi Coast, stretching along the southern edge of the Sorrentine Peninsula. Our expedition begins in the enchanting town of Sorrento, known for its fragrant lemon groves and panoramic vistas of the Gulf of Naples. Follow us as we wander through Sorrento's charming streets, savoring authentic Italian cuisine, and taking in the warm Mediterranean sun.

\n

As we venture further along the coast, the scenery becomes even more enchanting. The winding coastal roads offer jaw-dropping views of rugged cliffs plunging into the cerulean waters of the Tyrrhenian Sea. You'll be left in awe as we showcase the iconic towns of Positano, Amalfi, and Ravello, each with its own unique charm and history. Marvel at the colorful houses perched on cliffs, the narrow winding alleys, and the centuries-old churches that dot the landscape.

\n

Our exploration extends beyond the towns, as we venture into the lush lemon and olive groves that blanket the hillsides. Learn about the region's traditional farming practices and taste some of the freshest produce you'll ever encounter. The aroma of lemon blossoms and the taste of locally produced limoncello will linger in your senses.

\n

But the Amalfi Coast isn't just about its stunning scenery and delectable cuisine; it's also steeped in history. We'll visit ancient watchtowers, such as the Torre dello Ziro, which once guarded against pirate attacks, and the magnificent Villa Cimbrone in Ravello, where you'll find beautiful gardens and panoramic terraces that have inspired artists and writers for centuries.

\n

Our journey is not limited to the daylight hours, as we showcase the magic of the Amalfi Coast at sunset. Watch the sky burst into vibrant hues as the sun dips below the horizon, casting a golden glow on the Mediterranean waters.

\n

Join us as we immerse ourselves in the rich culture, history, and natural beauty of the Amalfi Coast in this visually stunning video. Whether you're planning a future trip
